title: The Thom Hartmann Show - May 8, 2008 (24kbs Audio 110 min)
description:
Hour One - Is racism so ingrained in America - we can&#039;t get rid of it?

Hour Two - Former Gov. Don Siegelman  www.donsiegelman.org Topic: Updates on his case  & will take listener calls  - This is the case that could land Karl Rove in jail!

Hour Three -  www.lcurve.org for an economic perspective;  Christy Harvey  www.americanprogress.org Topic: News Under the Radar
